entry.title: $2200 // Newly Renovated 1 Bedroom
entry.content:
Want to live in the Heart of Williamsburg, a real prime location .Just two blocks from the subway, enjoy both a quick commute into the city and coming home to Brooklyns incomparable laid-back lifestyle. Right around the corner, youll find an abundance of eclectic eateries, chic cafes, nightlife options and music venues.
Retreat from the hustle and bustle of Manhattan to brand new, light-filled apartments featuring exquisite designer interiors. Kitchens include sleek custom designed cabinetry, backlit countertops and all stainless steel appliances. Bathrooms feature porcelain vanities, ceramic tiles, rainfall shower heads and spa-like deep soaking tubs.
residences are all fully equipped with a virtual doorman in-unit and Blue Tooth surround sound entertainment system. The building offers its residents an on-site laundry facility and a communal, landscaped backyard.
We got you because we
have probably the
largest
inventory of cool
apartments BKLYN
